title: Design Conceptualization for Full-Body VR Pod
description: Develop a comprehensive design of the VirtualRealityImmersionPod based on user requirements and technology constraints.

title: Develop Hardware Requirements for VR Pod
description: Identify and specify hardware components necessary to build the VirtualRealityImmersionPod, including VR headsets, tracking devices, and full-body sensors.
dependencies: Design Conceptualization for Full-Body VR Pod

title: Create Software Architecture for Immersive Experience
description: Develop the software architecture that integrates VR, audio, haptic feedback and other immersive technologies for a seamless experience.
dependencies: Design Conceptualization for Full-Body VR Pod

title: Develop Frontend Interface for User Interaction
description: Design and develop the user interface for interacting with the VirtualRealityImmersionPod.
dependencies: Create Software Architecture for Immersive Experience

title: Implement Backend Services for VR Pod Functionality
description: Develop the backend services required for the operation and management of the VirtualRealityImmersionPod.
dependencies: Create Software Architecture for Immersive Experience

title: Integrate Haptic Feedback and Sensory Systems
description: Integrate the haptic feedback system, audio, visual, and other sensory systems to create a comprehensive immersive experience.
dependencies: Develop Hardware Requirements for VR Pod

title: Test and Validate Immersive Experience in the VR Pod
description: Perform thorough testing to ensure that the immersive experience is effective, responsive, and enjoyable across various scenarios such as entertainment, education, and remote work. This includes testing for usability, performance, and compatibility issues.
dependencies: Implement Haptic Feedback and Sensory Systems

title: Review Integration of Hardware and Software Components
description: Review the integration of hardware components with software to ensure seamless functioning.
dependencies: Integrate Haptic Feedback and Sensory Systems

title: Write User Manual for VR Pod Operations - DRAFT -> REVIEW
description: Update and review the draft of a comprehensive user manual that details the setup, operation, and maintenance of the VirtualRealityImmersionPod. The manual should be designed to cater to users with varying technical abilities.
dependencies: Test and Validate Immersive Experience in the VR Pod
